summary: Genocide is the crime of killing many people who are all part of one ethnic or religious group, or some sort of similar group, and trying to destroy that group.
full_text: Genocide is the intent to systematically eliminate a racial, ethnic, religious, cultural or national group. Well-known examples of genocide include the Armenian Genocide, the Holocaust, the Holodomor , 1971 Bangladesh Genocide, and more recently the Rwandan Genocide and the Bosnian Genocide.
title: Genocide
